casebody.data:
CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2005. David P. Ferrell, Raleigh, Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for NW Sign Industries, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Capps) shall have up to and including the 23rd day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of October 2005."
